rComments: Lectures are super boring and no past exams are given. Homework has no deep connection to exams. A lot of extra credits. Personally, not a fan of him.
Easy A. Just memorize slides/ vocab.

Love is a nice guy but he's super boring. I fell asleep in most lectures but you should still go to get the clicker points. Read the book before the exams. The material is super basic and mainly common sense but you have to know the terms he's looking for.

Lecture is pretty boring but you can get extra credit by showing up and doing the i-clickers. Make sure you read the textbook before exams, it will really help you out. He uses scenarios and hypothetical situations as most of the exam questions so you have to know how to apply the terms/topics and not just definitions.

Attendance is mandatory because you get iclicker points. Everything in this class is easy, but the exams are difficult. The actual material is not difficult. However, there are too many powerpoint slides and hundreds of definitions to memorize for each exam. Love is a great professor, and he is very kind. You'll love him!
All I can remember about Prof. Love is his pink shirts!!!! And the fact that his class is interesting with the relevant movie clips and iClicker questions kept me focused.

Basically, if you memorize all his slides you will get A's on his exams. Unfortunately, this is sometimes lots of material for one to digest easily in a short time span. Other than that, there is lots of opportunity for extra credit (can boost your grade by around 5% total) and it's very manageable to get at least a B in this class.

The class is boring! Tests are harder than I expected especially the third one. Read the book is a must. He likes to test on details. Though he said we do not have to remember the examples in the book, some questions are from those. Would be helpful if he can tell us what will be in the test.

The material is very dry so its difficult to pay attention. You have to go to class in order to get attendance points with the iclicker. Good guy but he needs to give some hints as to whats on the exam. He emphasizes the slides but still no direction. It' d be nice if he said what to focus on. Its alot of material to cover when youre studying

The class is misleadingly easy, and the tests seem misleadingly easy until you get your grades back and find out you didn't do well. Basically just tells you to study everything for exams and makes the lectures as boring as they could possibly be. I dread going to class and have no motivation to try in it.
He is a food person.

This class is straight forward. Read the book is a must to do well on the exams. His slides are important as well. Lastly, do the homework with some thought and this class should not be hard. It does require a good amount of effort, though.

A boring, straight-forward class. Love is a good guy, but the information is just too dry and repetitive to be interesting. Read the book, review his slides thoroughly, and spare yourself by doing something else during lecture. Impossible to not get an A as long as you are a relatively good student.
Boring lectures. Reading the textbook is mandatory for doing well on exams. Not a bad guy, but could be more helpful in telling you what's on the exams.
Very very easy exams. Just go through the slides and understand every single definition in it. Otherwise, the exams may seem a bit ambiguous.
The class sucks, but gLove is awesome. He is very reasonable and tries to make the class tolerable.

The class is not that interesting. The exams are semi-easy...you just have to memorize the materials taught. I suggest you take all the e.c. opportunity...because just when you think you are going to ace every test...the third exam comes along and it is so much harder than the previous exams!

Most boring class ever. Questions on the exams are hard if you don't memorize every single detail from the PP slides. 3 ridiculous exams of 50 points each make up the entire class. The practice sample exams are pretty easy compared to the real exams.

very easy. very boring. dont really need to pay attention. for exams use the study guide and read over slides. going to class is a must due to EC iclickers. book not needed at all, dont bother. do need a CD though. also has 8pts of experiments u can do.

BADM 310 is just a very boring class, there is nothing wrong with the Professor though. BUT don't leave early he will make a big deal out of it.Your grade will be out of 300 points; 100 per exam. Memorize every single detail on the slides and you will get at least a B. The textbook use is rare (but still needed).
